statements: SELECT * FROM user_auth;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_auth WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM user_auth ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, created_at FROM user_auth WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_auth WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_auth ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_auth WHERE created_at > '2020-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users INNER JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE sessions.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, password_hash, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM UserRoles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, t.token_value, t.expiry_timestamp FROM Users u JOIN Tokens t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM Users u JOIN UserRoles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(token_id) AS token_count FROM Tokens GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(token_id) > 3;
SELECT id, username, password FROM user_auth;
SELECT role_name, id FROM role ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM session WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, username FROM user_auth WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_auth WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM user_auth WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT role.role_name, user_auth.username FROM user_roles JOIN role ON user_roles.role_id = role.id JOIN user_auth ON user_roles.user_id = user_auth.id;
SELECT username, role.role_name FROM user_auth JOIN user_roles ON user_auth.id = user_roles.user_id JOIN role ON user_roles.role_id = role.id ORDER BY user_auth.username ASC;
SELECT user_auth.username, role.role_name FROM user_auth LEFT JOIN user_roles ON user_auth.id = user_roles.user_id LEFT JOIN role ON user_roles.role_id = role.id WHERE role.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_date >= NOW();
SELECT u.username, pr.reset_code FROM users u JOIN password_reset pr ON u.user_id = pr.user_id WHERE pr.expiration_date > NOW();
